meanings.definition: Relating to or producing amylase, an enzyme that breaks down starch into sugars.
meanings.sent1: The amylolytic enzyme helped to convert the starch into sugars.
meanings.sent2: The amylolytic process is essential for digesting starchy foods.
meanings.sent3: The amylolytic power of the enzyme turned the bland starch into a sweet treat.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills were as amylolytic as a magician turning starch into gold.
meanings.sent5: The amylolytic action of the enzyme was like a key unlocking the sugars in the starch.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to break down starches.
meanings.sent1: The amylolytic properties of the substance helped in breaking down the starch.
meanings.sent2: Certain foods contain amylolytic components that aid in digestion.
meanings.sent3: The amylolytic nature of the enzyme made it the superhero of starch digestion.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as amylolytic as the enzyme breaking down starch.
meanings.sent5: The amylolytic ability of the compound was like a tiny army dismantling the starch molecules.
